direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods close a user data stream but for different types (margin vs. spot).
Both methods handle user data streams with similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods involve managing the lifecycle of a margin listen key.
Both methods close a user data stream related to margin, though isolated vs. non-isolated.

enhanced_by.reason: Creating a margin listen key is a prerequisite for closing it.
Extending a margin listen key might be required before closing it to test the full lifecycle.
A verification method to assert that the listen key has been successfully closed.
